body_html:
the python implementation uses None to indicate "no connection" but I'm not sure that returning null in c++ will have the same effect.

So I have three options: return 0, return the input gradient, or return a zero matrix.

Also, there is no test for the python version, so I'm really lost on how to test this one.

body:
the python implementation uses None to indicate "no connection" but I'm not sure that returning null in c++ will have the same effect.  

So I have three options: return 0, return the input gradient, or return a zero matrix. 

Also, there is no test for the python version, so I'm really lost on how to test this one.
